args.natural_language_statement: The matrix group SO(2) is isomorphic to the group {ρ_theta: theta in R} of rotations of the Euclidean plane R^2.

result:
{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open Complex
open CharZero
open ComplexConjugate

/-- The matrix group SO(2) is isomorphic to the group {ρ_theta: theta in R} of rotations of the Euclidean plane R^2. -/
theorem so_two_equiv_circle : SO(2 : ℝ) ≃ (fun θ : ℝ => ρ θ) := sorry"}

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- The matrix group SO(2) is isomorphic to the group of rotations ρθ. -/
def RotGroup := { θ : ℝ // True }

theorem so_two_equiv_circle : SO(2 : ℝ) ≃ RotGroup := by
  sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- The matrix group SO(2) is isomorphic to the group { θ : ℝ // True } of rotations parameterized by θ. -/

def RotGroup := { θ : ℝ // True }

theorem so_two_equiv_circle : SO(2 : ℝ) ≃ RotGroup := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

/-- The matrix group SO(2) is isomorphic to the group { ρ_θ : θ ∈ ℝ } of rotations of the Euclidean plane. -/

def RotGroup := { θ : ℝ // True }

theorem so_two_equiv_circle : SO(2 : ℝ) ≃ RotGroup := by
  sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- The matrix group SO(2) is isomorphic to the group of rotations of the Euclidean plane, realized as the unit circle. -/
theorem so_two_equiv_unit_circle : SO(2 : ℝ) ≃ UnitCircle := by
  sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- The matrix group SO(2) is isomorphic to the group UnitCircle of unit complex numbers. -/
theorem so_two_equiv_unit_circle : SO 2 ≃ UnitCircle := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

/-- The matrix group SO(2) is isomorphic to the group { ρ_θ : θ ∈ ℝ } of rotations of the Euclidean plane. -/
theorem so_two_equiv_unit_circle : SO(2 : ℝ) ≃ UnitCircle := by
